sentences: He also produces film posters for the specialist Mondo Gallery in Austin, Texas, USA.
His father, Wayne Slater, is an author and has been a political writer for the Dallas Morning News since the mid-1980s; he has co-written three books with James Moore, including Bush's Brain.
The Slater family moved to Austin, Texas when Todd was five years old.
Todd Slater graduated from Stephen F. Austin State University, Nacogdoches in Texas in 2002, majoring in art with an emphasis on design and minors in film and painting.
Although not a core part of Slater's work he has expressed an interest in album cover art, and produced six vinyl single sleeves for The Dead Weather in 2009.
Neil Young: Long May You Run: The Illustrated History.
